course.title: Introduction to the Hebrew Bible/Old Testament 2: Latter Prophets and Writings
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., at 10-11:30, and a section to be arranged
course.description: A critical introduction to the literature and theology of the Hebrew Bible, considered in light of the historical contexts of its formation and the interpretive contexts of its reception within Judaism and Christianity. The course, the second part of a divisible, year-long sequence, will focus on the Latter Prophets and the Writings.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1103.
